author: John Doe
comment:
Hello,

Could you explain how this web app works?

Regards,

John

author: Pedro Alves
comment:
Hi,

The project is split into numerous folders:
	- Components: Contains reusable components
	- Interfaces: Typescript types
	- Layouts: The overall layout of the site (currently only the MainLayout with the Navbar you see)
	- Pages: Child components displayed inside a route (ex. the Tickets table)
	- Routes: The content to display under the Navbar depending on the URL
	- Schemas: Zod schemas used for data validation and parsing

You many find the source code for the site here: https://github.com/overthemil/ticket-viewer
